io.smudgr.app.view

Class FileDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.app.view.FileDialog

  • public class FileDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    The FileDialog singleton opens a native JFileChooser and passes a selected file or set of files to a given FileDialog.FileDialogCallback
    See Also:
    getInstance(), FileDialog.show(actionName, allowMultiselect, fileFilter, callback), FileDialog.FileDialogCallback

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileDialog.FileDialogCallback
      The FileDialog.FileDialogCallback interface allows passing behavior for what to do when the file chooser is resolved, either from user cancellation or actual file selection.
      static class  FileDialog.FileDialogFilter
      Instances of the FileDialog.FileDialogFilter class allows restricting selections to a specific file type for a FileDialog

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileDialog getInstance()
      Get the current application instance's FileDialog service
      void show(java.lang.String actionName, boolean allowMultiselect, FileDialog.FileDialogFilter fileFilter, FileDialog.FileDialogCallback callback)
      Show a file chooser with the specified parameters

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FileDialog getInstance()
        Get the current application instance's FileDialog service
        Returns:
        FileDialog
        See Also:
        FileDialog.show(actionName, allowMultiselect, fileFilter, callback)

      • show

        public void show(java.lang.String actionName,
                 boolean allowMultiselect,
                 FileDialog.FileDialogFilter fileFilter,
                 FileDialog.FileDialogCallback callback)
        Show a file chooser with the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        actionName - Approval button text (i.e. Save, Open, Load)
        allowMultiselect - Allow the selection of multiple files
        fileFilter - FileDialog.FileDialogFilter to allow only certain file types
        callback - Function to call with selected files, or failure message
        See Also:
        FileDialog.FileDialogCallback
